name: party 2
description:
Description:

Party 2 is a game where you run for mayor. Campaign around the town, and get the people to join your party. Be careful, some actions could ruin your career.

(Fullscreen is highly recommended.)

Note: 

This game is very short, as it was just made for a jam.  I don't have a ton of experience with Unity, but I tried my best! I might make this into a fully fledged game someday, but probably not.

Controls:

Use WASD to move your character
Mouse to move the camera
Press E to start or end conversation with someone
Use the Scroll Wheel to cycle through dialogue options
Press Enter to choose a dialogue option
Hold Left Shift to run
Press P to skip to the election

Credits:

Programming, models, and audio by TetrisKid48
Made in Unity
Models made with tinkercad
Audio made in jsfxr and BeepBox
Grass, road, and wall textures from "Five Seamless Tileable Ground Textures" in Unity Asset Store
For GMTK Game Jam 2021
